metadata.name: Changes To PIM Settings
metadata.comment: Detects when changes are made to PIM roles

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('update role setting in pim'))

output.summary: Detects when changes are made to PIM roles

metadata.objective: False positive: Legit administrative PIM setting configuration changes Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-identity-management#azure-ad-roles-assignment
